New Records: Zimbabwe defended the lowest total in a T20I against India (115) and India scored their lowest total in Harare (102)
Key Match Events: Tendai Chatara bowled a nerveless 20th over to secure the win
India collapsed to 102 in 19.5 overs with a quick loss of wickets
Pre-Game Insights: India fielded a second-string squad with key players rested post the World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: Zimbabwe players celebrated a historic win against India
Washington Sundar and Sikandar Raza were praised for their performances
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Zimbabwe's first win against India since 2016
The match was played in front of a packed Harare Sports Club
